title: When Genes Meet Environmental Shocks: A Spatiotemporal Cohort Linking Pathogen Phylogenetics, Metagenomic Ecology, and Triage Algorithm Fairness Drift to Predict Incident Cardiometabolic and Infectious Outcomes
description: Spatiotemporal cohort study integrating pathogen phylogenetics, metagenomic ecology, and AI triage algorithms to predict cardiometabolic and infectious disease outcomes.

title: Sequence Matters in Real-World Pharmacotherapy: Medication Switching Trajectories, Genomic/Transcriptomic Assembly Signatures, and AI-Driven Drug Discovery for Predicting Adverse Outcomes in a Digital Cohort
description: Analysis of medication switching patterns combined with genomic signatures and AI-driven approaches for adverse outcome prediction in digital cohorts.

title: Digital Nudges to Improve ERAS Compliance and Surgical Outcomes: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
description: Systematic review and meta-analysis examining the effectiveness of digital interventions in improving Enhanced Recovery After Surgery (ERAS) protocol compliance.

title: Beyond Thresholds to Pre-Flare Prediction: A Multimodal Digital Cohort Integrating Longitudinal Laboratory Drift, Wearable Signatures, and Metagenomic Ecological Volatility with Transcriptome-Assisted Risk Modeling
description: Multimodal prediction framework combining laboratory data, wearable sensors, metagenomics, and transcriptomics for disease flare prediction.

title: Radiotherapy Outcomes in Stage III NSCLC by Age: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
description: Meta-analysis evaluating radiotherapy outcomes in Stage III Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer across different age groups.

title: Di Balik Citra PET/CT: Validasi Meta-Analitis Radiomik sebagai Panduan Presisi dan Prediktor Outcome pada NSCLC - Potensi Radiomik dalam Meningkatkan Akurasi dan Konsistensi Penentuan Volume Target
description: Meta-analytic validation of radiomics from PET/CT imaging as precision guide and outcome predictor in NSCLC treatment planning.

title: The Safety Imperative: A Deep Dive into Lithium-Ion Power Bank Regulations and Hazard Mitigation in Air Travel - The Escalating Threat: Quantifying the Risk of Lithium Battery Incidents in Aviation
description: Safety analysis of lithium-ion power bank regulations and risk quantification of battery incidents in aviation settings.

title: Meta-Analisis Faktor Prognostik (Metilasi MGMT, Mutasi IDH, dan Volume Tumor) terhadap Respons Radioterapi pada Glioblastoma: Tinjauan Sistematis Bukti 10 Tahun Terakhir
description: Systematic review and meta-analysis of prognostic factors (MGMT methylation, IDH mutation, tumor volume) affecting radiotherapy response in glioblastoma.

title: Tinjauan Sistematik Hasil Neurokognitif Jangka Panjang pada Anak dan Remaja dengan Tumor Otak: Perbandingan Radioterapi Proton dan Foton
description: Systematic review of long-term neurocognitive outcomes in pediatric brain tumor patients comparing proton versus photon radiotherapy.

title: Analisis Komprehensif Efektivitas Radiosurgery Stereotaktik (SRS/SBRT) vs. Radiotherapy Seluruh Otak (WBRT) pada Metastasis Otak Terbatas Berdasarkan Kelompok Usia
description: Comprehensive analysis of SRS/SBRT versus WBRT effectiveness in limited brain metastases across different age groups.

title: Perbandingan Staged SRS dan Fraksionasi SRS pada Metastasis Otak Besar - Tinjauan Sistematis Efektivitas terhadap Kontrol Tumor Lokal dan Survival
description: Systematic review comparing staged SRS versus fractionated SRS in large brain metastases for local tumor control and survival outcomes.

title: Analisis Komparatif Terapi Proton versus Foton (IMRT/VMAT) pada Glioma Dewasa: Evaluasi Survival, Toksisitas, dan Segmentasi Berbasis Genetik
description: Comparative analysis of proton versus photon therapy (IMRT/VMAT) in adult gliomas, evaluating survival, toxicity, and genetic-based segmentation.

title: Hubungan Lama Fraksinasi, Volume Radiasi, dan Terapi Konkomitan terhadap Penurunan Jumlah Limfosit pada Pasien Kanker Kepala-Leher: Analisis Studi Kohort Prospektif
description: Prospective cohort study examining the relationship between fractionation duration, radiation volume, and concomitant therapy on lymphocyte decline in head-neck cancer patients.

title: Comparative Studies of VMAT vs. IMRT in Locally Advanced/High-Risk Prostate Cancer
description: Comparative research data on VMAT versus IMRT treatment outcomes in locally advanced and high-risk prostate cancer.

title: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis Comparing Volumetric Modulated Arc Therapy (VMAT) and Intensity-Modulated Radiotherapy (IMRT) for Locally Advanced Prostate Cancer: Background and Rationale
description: Systematic review and meta-analysis comparing VMAT and IMRT techniques for locally advanced prostate cancer treatment.

title: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of Zero-Trust Architecture Adoption: Quantifying Reduction in Lateral Movement Attacks and Mean Time to Detection Across Enterprise Networks
description: Systematic review analyzing zero-trust architecture adoption and its impact on cybersecurity metrics including lateral movement attacks and detection time.
